paragraphs: Hi, I'm Shine Maung Oo, a web developer from Yangon, Myanmar, with a passion for front-end development. I specialize in creating dynamic, responsive web applications, focusing on technologies like JavaScript and frameworks such as React.js, Next.js and Vue.js.

While I have experience with backend development using PHP and Laravel, my true passion lies in crafting intuitive and engaging user interfaces. I believe that a well-designed interface significantly enhances user experience and satisfaction.
I'm always eager to learn new technologies and improve my skills. Connect with me on LinkedIn or via email.
